title: Radisson Hotel Group debuts in Bihar, to start operations in Q4 2027
description: Radisson Hotel Group announced the signing of its first hotel in Bihar, Radisson Hotel Patna, in partnership with Naturals Dairy Private Limited. It is expected to be operational by Q4 2027 in Patnaâ€™s Patliputra area. The hotel will have 120 rooms, two ballrooms, a fitness area, a swimming pool, and multiple dining options.
